tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently had a wisdom tooth extraction surgery performed by Dr. Srikanth, and I couldn't be more pleased with the entire experience. From start to finish, everything about the procedure was exceptional.First and foremost, I was pleasantly surprised at how painless the surgery was. Doctor and his team took excellent care to ensure my comfort throughout the entire process. He explained every step of the procedure and made sure I was at ease, which significantly reduced my anxiety about the surgery.The actual extraction was completed in no time for me, and I experienced minimal discomfort during and after the surgery, which I attribute to his expertise.Furthermore, I found Dr. Srikanth to be incredibly easy-going and considerate. He patiently answered all my questions and addressed any concerns I had. His approachable and friendly demeanor put me at ease, and it was evident that they genuinely cared about my well-being before, during and even after surgery.Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Srikanth for anyone in need of oral surgery or dental care as the painless procedure, swift execution, and the doctor's easy-going and considerate nature made a significant difference in my overall comfort and satisfaction.
reply_text: Thank you so very much for a wonderful feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Went to Sris dental for removal of my third molar teeth. I was very afraid as multiple dentist had advised me not to remove teeth due its proximity to the veins, the teeth was literally wrapped around the vein. But the doctor was very extremely experienced and immediately understood how to go about the surgery, he listened very patiently to all my concerns and since I was very anxious about the surgery,  he very patiently kept updating me about the process to ease my anxiety and fear.

Would highly recommend Sris dental clinic to anyone. I went ahead with removal of my third molar and a root canal to one of my teeth, the entire process was completely painless and the doctor continued to support and check in on the progress post surgery via WhatsApp.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the appreciation and feedback. Glad to see this and that you had a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my son to Dr. Sri's Dental & Implant Clinic, Gachibowli for a tooth correction consultation and I had no issues or complications and overall the experience was great. Dr. Sri was all kind and patient with my son, who was a bit nervous about the appointment. Dr. Sri, was thorough in his examination and recommended INVISALIGN. The process took about a year and it was well worth the wait. Dr. Sri kept us informed every step of the way and made sure my son was comfortable. My son's teeth look amazing now and he is very happy with the final result. Dr. Sri truly exceeded my expectations and I am grateful for the beautiful smile he gave my son. I highly recommend this clinic for anyone looking for a dentist in and around Gachibowli, Hyderabad.
reply_text: Thank you so very much for the appreciation :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: if you think dental treatment is painful, visit Dr Srikant, He will prove it as a myth. I postponed my Dental treatment just because of this myth almost 7  years managing with a temporary solution. Now when I am not able to manage, after reference from a friend, i visited @Dr Sris dental. When I expressed fear of pain, Dr.Srikanth laughed and assured me there won't be any unbearable pain and also explained to me the procedure and treatment very well. I Went through the Root canal and wisdom tooth extraction. Wow to my surprise, no pain, except minor discomfort during the procedure, rest is just normal. He is very professional, very patient and clears all your doubts. His charges are also reasonable. Thanks Srikanth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Srikanth treated me for third molar teeth removals, scaling and teeth filling. The molar extraction needed a surgery. The procedure was smooth and he was very attentive and caring. He walked me through the x-rays of the teeth and explained why i needed the extraction in the first place. The recovery process was comfortable. Someone is always available in whatsApp if you need any suggestion or help after the surgery.

I would definitely refer my family and friends for any dental treatment.

Be assured that you'll be in good hands.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Surgery,
review:
Dr Srikanth treated me for extractions of all of my third molars, two of which were impacted and required deep surgery. I was on a tight travel schedule and he was calm and patient and walked me step by step through the entire procedure, giving me flexibility and genuine pros/cons of each approach.

The surgery was comfortable and he was attentive, careful and hardworking. The recovery period was very smooth and I did not experience any complications or pains at all.

I am hard of hearing and he took extreme pains to be accommodating and communicate with me in a way that made me comfortable.

I was referred to him through a contact and did not approach him via Practo. But I was so impressed with his work that I decided to sign up for Practo and leave a review here so people know how good of a dental surgeon he is. I will happily recommend him to all my friends needing dental work from even outside Hyd.
reply_text: Hi Raunak. It's absolutely a delight to see this, and feels very good to be appreciated by you for my hard work. I thank you for your warm wishes and wish you good health always :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The best dental care I have ever experienced! Professional, courteous, and friendly Dr. Srikanth made me feel happy we expect in work without pain he removed my teeth üòäüòäüòä would highly recommend to anyone!!! 
It's been nearly a month since I got my root canal done by Dr Srikanth, and I have no complaints at all. Starting from the consult where he took multiple x-rays and suggested the right way forward, to the three sittings for the entire procedure, it was a very pleasant experience.

Throughout the process, he made me feel comfortable, and I felt little to no pain. He took time to walk me through the process and explain all the conditions of my teeth. He ensured that the crown was fit properly with followups on phone after the sessions completed.

I would totally recommend him for anyone who want to take care of their teeth.
reply_text: Firstly thank you so very much for the detailed feedback and your appreciation. Secondly I am duty bound to serve my patients in the best way possible. This made me smile, tha k you.
